Name: TA 1319 Flow control edit page UI tests

Tests.Name: Test 1: Create a flow control from the list page

Steps.Name: Step: Create a flow control 'fc'
Step: User can create a flow control with text name
Step: User cannot create a flow control with empty name

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'' is too short

Failed validating 'minLength' in schema['properties']['name']:
    {'description': 'Name of entity shown in UI',
     'minLength': 1,
     'title': 'Name',
     'type': 'string'}

On instance['name']:
    ''"

Steps.Name: Step: User cannot create a flow control with exist name

Expected.Text: b'409 Conflict: entry with name flow_control_text_name already exists in document [flowcontrol]'

Steps.Name: Step: User can create a flow control with long name
Step: User can create a flow control with special chars name
Step: User cannot create a flow control with space char name
Step: User can create a flow control with leading space char name
Step: User check flow control with leading space char name
Step: User can create a flow control with trailing space char name
Step: User check flow control with trailing space char name
Step: Create a flow control 'fc-60'
Step: User cannot create a flow control with empty timeframe
Step: User cannot create a flow control with decimal with dot timeframe
Step: User cannot create a flow control with negative timeframe
Step: User cannot create a flow control with text timeframe

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'text' is not of type 'number'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['timeframe']:
    {'description': 'The time in which to limit the requests according to '
                    'the threshold',
     'title': 'Time To Limit',
     'type': 'number'}

On instance['timeframe']:
    'text'"

Step: Create a flow control 'fc-for-delete'

Step: Create a flow control with several conditions

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
[{'args': {}, 'cookies': {}, 'headers': {'host': 'www.example.com'}, 'method': 'GET', 'uri': '/login'}, {'args': {}, 'cookies': {}, 'headers': {'host': 'www.example.com'}, 'method': 'GET', 'uri': '/login'}] has non-unique elements

Failed validating 'uniqueItems' in schema['properties']['sequence']:
    {'description': 'Array of sections describing steps of restricted flow',
     'items': {'properties': {'args': {'$ref': '#/definitions/string-values-obj'},
                              'cookies': {'$ref': '#/definitions/string-values-obj'},
                              'headers': {'$ref': '#/definitions/string-values-obj'},
                              'method': {'enum': ['GET',
                                                  'HEAD',
                                                  'POST',
                                                  'PUT',
                                                  'DELETE',
                                                  'CONNECT',
                                                  'TRACE',
                                                  'OPTIONS',
                                                  'PATCH']},
                              'plugins': {'$ref': '#/definitions/string-values-obj'},
                              'uri': {'type': 'string'}},
               'required': ['method', 'uri'],
               'type': 'object'},
     'title': 'Sequence',
     'type': 'array',
     'uniqueItems': True}

On instance['sequence']:
    [{'args': {},
      'cookies': {},
      'headers': {'host': 'www.example.com'},
      'method': 'GET',
      'uri': '/login'},
     {'args': {},
      'cookies': {},
      'headers': {'host': 'www.example.com'},
      'method': 'GET',
      'uri': '/login'}]"
